explains: n. 观察者；看守人；哨兵；（美）选举监票员
wordGroup: clock watcher n. 盼望下班的人

sentences.en: Presently the watcher began to nod; his head drooped lower and lower, both men began to snore now.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿，看守开始打盹了。他的头越来越低，两个人都打起鼾来。

sentences.en: I used to be an avid TV watcher.
And finally, there is the Watcher Perspective.
